Package org.numenta.nupic.monitor.mixin

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MonitorMixinBase
    Base class for MonitorMixin.
    TemporalMemoryMonitorMixin
    Contains methods to create the Traces used to gather test results and create Metrics from them for analysis and pretty-printing This interface contains "defender" methods or Traits that are used to collect result data for the TemporalMemory.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoolsTrace
    Each entry contains booleans (for example resets).
    CountsTrace
    A new Trace made up of counts of this trace's indices.
    IndicesTrace
    Each entry contains indices (for example of predicted => active cells).
    IndicesTraceTest  
    Metric
    Metric class used in monitor mixin framework.
    MetricsTrace
    Each entry contains Metrics (for example metric for # of predicted => active cells).
    MetricsTraceTest  
    MetricTest  
    MonitoredTemporalMemoryTest  
    StringsTrace
    Each entry contains strings (for example sequence labels).
    Trace<T>
    A record of the past data the algorithm has seen, with an entry for each iteration.
